document_data.name: Shadow screen
document_data.mainbody: A '''shadow screen''' was a unique magical barrier that could only be seen through from one direction.
document_data.Description: The shielded side of a shadow screen always appeared as a shifting haze of gloom to those views from the opposite side, while the individual behind the screen could clearly see everything on the other side.
document_data.Uses: One documented use of a shadow screen was in [[Urtos Dulbiir]]'s [[Dulbiir's|establishment]] in Arabel where the screens were used by anonymous voyeurs who watched others cavort around in elaborate costumes and "play act."
